| Weight                                                            | 5                                                                               |

| Monster use                                                       | *May be used [defensively](/wiki/Defensive_item "Defensive item") by monsters.* |

The **scroll of elementalism** is a [scroll](/wiki/Scroll "Scroll") that appears in the [Lethe patch](/wiki/Lethe_patch "Lethe patch"), [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). When read it can summon [elementals](/wiki/Elemental "Elemental") or elemental spheres.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Effects](#Effects)

  - [1.1 Confused reading](#Confused_reading)
  - [1.2 Monster use](#Monster_use)

- [2 Messages](#Messages)

- [3 History](#History)

- [4 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)

  - [4.1 Scroll of elementalism](#Scroll_of_elementalism)
  - [4.2 Elementalism](#Elementalism)

- [5 References](#References)

## Effects

If you read the scroll while you are not confused, elementals will be created. Any elemental in the game is eligible except the [fusion elemental](/wiki/Fusion_elemental "Fusion elemental"). This includes the [new SpliceHack-specific elementals](/wiki/Elemental_\(SpliceHack\) "Elemental (SpliceHack)") that are rarely seen otherwise.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

The number and hostility of the elementals depend on the [beatitude](/wiki/Beatitude "Beatitude") of the scroll.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

| Beatitude                             | Number | Hostility                                                                                               |
| ------------------------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Blessed](/wiki/Blessed "Blessed")    | 1      | 1⁄3 chance of being [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile"), otherwise [tame](/wiki/Tame "Tame")             |
| [Uncursed](/wiki/Uncursed "Uncursed") | 1      | 1⁄2 chance of being [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile"), otherwise [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful") |
| [Cursed](/wiki/Cursed "Cursed")       | 2-4    | always [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile")                                                               |

### Confused reading

If you read the scroll while confused, the scroll will create [gas spores](/wiki/Gas_spore "Gas spore"), [flaming spheres](/wiki/Flaming_sphere "Flaming sphere"), [freezing spheres](/wiki/Freezing_sphere "Freezing sphere") or [shocking spheres](/wiki/Shocking_sphere "Shocking sphere"). The number and hostility of the created monsters depend on the beatitude of the scroll:

| Beatitude                             | Number | Hostility                          |
| ------------------------------------- | ------ | ---------------------------------- |
| [Blessed](/wiki/Blessed "Blessed")    | 3-12   | [tame](/wiki/Tame "Tame")          |
| [Uncursed](/wiki/Uncursed "Uncursed") | 3-12   | [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile") |
| [Cursed](/wiki/Cursed "Cursed")       | 1      | [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile") |

### Monster use

Monsters can read this scroll. If the monster is confused, the scroll will create [gas spores](/wiki/Gas_spore "Gas spore"), [flaming spheres](/wiki/Flaming_sphere "Flaming sphere"), [freezing spheres](/wiki/Freezing_sphere "Freezing sphere") or [shocking spheres](/wiki/Shocking_sphere "Shocking sphere"). Otherwise it will create random elementals (excluding fusion elementals). The number of elementals is 1-12 for a cursed scroll, 1-4 otherwise.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

## Messages

- The elements swirl around you.

  You read the scroll of elementalism.

- You feel you have experienced something fundamental.

  As above, if [hallucinating](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination").

## History

The scroll of elementalism first appeared in the [Lethe patch](/wiki/Lethe_patch "Lethe patch"). It was added to SpliceHack in version 0.7.1 [\[4\]](#cite_note-4) and later ported to Hack'EM from SpliceHack.[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)

## Encyclopedia entry

### Scroll of elementalism

- *Main article: [Scroll § Encyclopedia entry](/wiki/Scroll#Encyclopedia_entry "Scroll")*

### Elementalism

The study of the elements and elemental beings, including the risky art of summoning and binding such dangerous entities.
